data.title: Miloura Romain
data.text:
About this Sponsorship

Help One Nowâ€™s Ferrier Village is a 10 home village that serves as a refuge for 51 children without parental care who have been rescued from trafficking situations, or are at a high risk of being trafficked. The goal for the kids of Ferrier is to not only care for their basic needs, but to restore them to physical, mental, emotional and spiritual health following the traumatic situations they have experienced.

Your monthly gift provides the child with everything from physical necessities such as food, clothes, shoes, hygiene products, water, and electricity to household necessities such as transportation, telephones, and wifi for their house moms. Your gift also funds the necessary books and supplies for their local school: Ansanm pou Ayiti.

The children of Ferrier Village are loved and cared for by on the ground staff 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
